jobDescription: Job Type: Per DiemAddress: Mayville, MI 48744Functions under physician’s orders. Provides and directs physical therapy services to residents, including assessment, treatment, program planning and implementation, and completes related documentation and communication. Common programs include: ambulation training, strengthening and conditioning, contracture management, wound care, cardiac rehab, balance training, modalities, orthotics, and back injury protection.Qualifications: Bachelor of Science in Physical Therapy from an accredited program. Successful completion of National Certification Examination for RPT. Current state licensure or license eligible. Regular attendance.Clinical Setting: Skilled Nursing Facility
